branchCategory.name: High Purity
branchCategory.description: <p>Valves with fluoropolymer construction or other quality materials for high purity applications.</p>

branchItem.name: LVQ
LVA
LVC
LVD
branchItem.description: <P>The LVD series are space saving, compact type, air operated high purity valves, which are designed to overcome the harsh environments often encountered in wet process applications. Its resin fluid path, makes it the perfect choice when working with acids, alkalis and ultra pure water. The LVD valves have PFA body materials and integral fittings (Hyper Fitting series LQ1 and clean series KP).</P>

branchItem.name: LVH
branchItem.description: LVH series air operated high purity valves are corrosion resistant against acid, alkali and ultra pure water, making the LVH valve the perfect answer to overcome the harsh environments often encountered in wet process applications. Series LVH is a manually operated valve, available in a threaded or integral fitting type.

branchItem.name: LVR
branchItem.description: <P>SMC's high purity liquid regulator, series LVR, offers superior performance in both pulsation dampening, as well as adjustable liquid flow control.  The LVR series is capable of 110° C operating temperature, which meets many of today's most demanding requirements.  LVR is available with SMC's new LQ3 HyperFlareâ„¢ connection.</P>

branchItem.name: LVP
branchItem.description: Series LVP, employs vinyl chloride CPVC for body material.  With its 2 ports, piping is possible in four directions.  Applicable fluids, deionized water and chemicals.
